description: This file defines an interface class IEventHandler within the WPEFramework::Plugin namespace. The interface declares multiple pure virtual methods for handling various events, such as runtime manager events, window manager events, ripple events, and state change events, all involving JSON data structures. The file also includes licensing information and include directives.

classes.name: IEventHandler
classes.description: An interface for handling different types of events with methods that must be implemented by derived classes.

methods.name: onRuntimeManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle runtime manager events with JSON data.

methods.name: onWindowManagerEvent
methods.description: Handle window manager events with JSON data.

methods.name: onRippleEvent
methods.description: Handle ripple events identified by a name and JSON data.

methods.name: onStateChangeEvent
methods.description: Handle state change events with JSON data.
